insights.observation: Brand keyword 'kona coffee donut' at #1.1 with 25.7% CTR (9 clicks from 35 impressions)
insights.suggestion: Brand awareness is strong. Focus on capturing generic 'near me' searches now.

insights.observation: Korean keyword with 25% CTR indicates tourist market opportunity
insights.suggestion: Expand multilingual content (Korean + Japanese) to capture tourist searches.

insights.observation: Poor performance on 'near me' and generic location queries (position #20+)

insights.suggestion: Publish all optimization and content changes NOW for maximum indexing time before launch.
